tha-ap540:14.1: patthayate ṭhānaṃ → patthayi taṃ ṭhānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap540:29.1: yathā raṅge → yathā laddho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap540:34.2: ogāhetvā mahāvanaṃ → jahitvāna mahādhanaṃ (bj); hivāna ca mahādhanaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap540:36.2: uruveḷanivāsiko → uruvelanivāsiko (bj); uruvelāya nīvasiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); uruvelānivāsitā (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap540:39.2: katvāna vividhāni me → katvā nānāvidhāni me (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
